title: Republican donors who helped Trump lawyer Rudy Giuliani in Ukraine 'arrested over campaign finance violations'
text:
Two businessman with ties to Rudy Giuliani's dealings in Ukraine have been arrested on campaign finance charges, US media has reported.

Lev Parnas and Igor Fruman have both been under investigation by the US attorney's office in Manhattan according to the Wall Street Journal.

The publication added that since late 2018 both men have helped Mr Giuliani meet current and former Ukrainian prosecutors to discuss allegations against Joe Biden and his son, Hunter.

Mr Giuliani is said to have identified the two men as his clients in May. Meanwhile both have reportedly donated to a number of Republican political campaigns including committees working to elect Donald Trump.

It is currently unclear what specific act their charges relate to.





More follows…
description: Two businessman with ties to Rudy Giuliani's dealings in Ukraine have been arrested on campaign finance charges, US media has reported.Lev Parnas and Igor Fruman have both been under investigation by the US attorney's office in Manhattan according to the Wall Street Journal.
